channel.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]ExtremeFighter[/size][/center]
Hello, this is a work in progress of my current project.
[b]What it is:[/b] It's a simple java game (but will be addicting) that [at the moment] has no graphics. At the moment it only has single player, but it should be easy to add all of the other features.
[b]Pictures:[/b] Pictures are very big, so click on urls. [url=http://i54.tinypic.com/nex6ao.png]Update 2[/url]
[url=http://tinypic.com/r/auy2xj/7]Update 3[/url]
[b]Updates:[/b]
[ul][li]Enemy names randomly generated.[/li] [li]Different fighting types require higher levels.[/li] [li]'punch' hits a random amount of damage (1-5), upon clicking 'confirm' it appends text to the text area showing how much was hit. After this, the bot hits randomly on you (1-5 if you use punch) etc.[/li] [li]Radio buttons can't be used if you don't have a high enough level.[/li] [li]10 radio buttons, boolean array and a hashmap used for this.[/li] [li]Made code not hardcoded because John told me to.[/li] [li]Finished attacks[/li] [li]basic experience + levels, in the future the opponent will become advanced as you level[/li] [li]player stats menu[/li] [li]shitty unlocks list[/li][/ul]
[size=24pt]CODONS:[/size] [url=http://pastebin.com/SR92BBmi]OPEN SOURCE CODE[/url] [url=http://pastebin.com/aW5QFBKu]OLD CODE SNIPPET[/url]

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Was just a suggestion…
Still, it should make the game more interesting to be able to spread your skills all around, or to be able to have a complete dexterity build or a complete str build?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Neon_Fortune Neon Fortune
item.description:
@Neon_Fortune wrote:

Looks cool man, keep adding to it.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Add a luck system into the game of sorts. Basically, critical hits (not max hits). Also, add things such as bullet proof armor or other forms of protection. Should make things more interesting.

Although you’ll probably just say

This is not Modern RuneWare.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

What if you add some “skills”, as in Dexterity, Strength, etc. and give level requirements for each weapon? Also make it so your chances to hit if your dexterity is high are higher, and your chances to be hit are lower as well, and make HP related to strength, so that against a person with over 9000 dexterity, you still have a chance of being able to survive the attacks until you are actually able to land a high hit on the guy which promptly drops him to 0 hp.

And, maybe add a few quests, unless you’re not willing to go that deep in.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:7, topic:376355"][quote author=Rix_ link=topic=472272.msg3494948#msg3494948 date=1297243431]
Nothing worth releasing.
[/quote]

It’s not finished yet, and most everything that you release is not worth releasing.[/quote]
Then why do you release stuff that’s incomplete? And yeah, everything I released (last was in November) was shit. Don’t worry, I upped my game while you were being dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

lulwot go for it
Do you plan to add any graphics and any other content?

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

The warnings were because I had a few unnecessary imports.

How the fuck do you have unnecessary imports in an ide?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Just seeing the number of public fields and the number of warnings at the side of netbeans shows how terribad this is as at the moment.
Since It’s all text based at the moment just keep it to the command line and then if you’ve written the program well you can easily write a front end gui to accomply the back-end.

needs moar sause!

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:376355"][quote author=Lin link=topic=472272.msg3454394#msg3454394 date=1293946506]
Not a good idea. It looks really boring and I don’t see the point in finishing it.

“10 radio buttons, boolean array and a hashmap used for this.” …Why…
[/quote]

1.) Just a project to keep me occupied, and I like to finish things/improve what I start.
2.) The radio buttons are for selecting what you want to fight with, the boolean array is for making it so you can actually use them, and the hashmap uses an integer key for the radio buttons for the levels needed (so if the user does not have the level needed, it will not allow them to use the radio button).[/quote]What’s wrong with creating a class extending the RadioButton and adding those two properties?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Not a good idea. It looks really boring and I don’t see the point in finishing it.

“10 radio buttons, boolean array and a hashmap used for this.” …Why…

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:2, topic:376355"][quote author=John459 link=topic=472272.msg3454237#msg3454237 date=1293942487]
Hmm, I wonder where you got this idea from. It wasn’t from my irc fightbot, no.

You didn’t say you were going to make a fightbot like mine but give it a gui etc, no.

/sarcasm
[/quote]

This is no bot, it doesn’t connect to an IRC server. The only thing that this has in common with your fight bot is the lack of graphics.

I also told you that I would make a fighting bot that was better than yours, and you told me to ‘go for it’.[/quote]

I never said it was similar, all I said was that you stole the idea and you are now attempting to do what you call improving, which, knowing you, will obviously fail.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Add BlacksOnly Mode which only allows you both to use Glocks (preferably 16/18).
Also a WhitesOnly Mode which only allows you to use Knives with white suits (preferably a machete).

item.title: [WIP] ExtremeFighter [#0.2]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[center][size=36pt]ExtremeFighter[/size][/center]

Hello, this is a work in progress of my current project.

What it is:
It’s a simple java game (but will be addicting) that [at the moment] has no graphics. At the moment it only has single player, but it should be easy to add all of the other features.

Pictures:
Pictures are very big, so click on urls.
Update 2

Update 3

Updates:

[ul][li]Enemy names randomly generated.[/li]
[li]Different fighting types require higher levels.[/li]
[li]‘punch’ hits a random amount of damage (1-5), upon clicking ‘confirm’ it appends text to the text area showing how much was hit. After this, the bot hits randomly on you (1-5 if you use punch) etc.[/li]
[li]Radio buttons can’t be used if you don’t have a high enough level.[/li]
[li]10 radio buttons, boolean array and a hashmap used for this.[/li]
[li]Made code not hardcoded because John told me to.[/li]
[li]Finished attacks[/li]
[li]basic experience + levels, in the future the opponent will become advanced as you level[/li]
[li]player stats menu[/li]
[li]shitty unlocks list[/li][/ul]
